metadata.title: CVE-2018-1047 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Wildfly 9.x. A path traversal vulnerability through theorg.wildfly.extension.undertow.deployment.ServletResourceManager.getResourcemethod could lead to information disclosure of arbitrary local files.

criterions.comment: undertow package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
